text:
Start using the 30% discount promo in a few easy steps below:
1. Click on the Promo code links: 👉 https://is.gd/3y1gS2
2. Select the items and add to cart.
3. In the shopping cart page, select the date and timing for self-collection/ delivery. Click Check-out
4. Continue to payment via Credit Cards, PayNow or Bank-transfer.

Sit back and relax while the food is deliver to you. 👍
Have a Great Week!

T&C: 30% discount on main dishes for 3 or more single main dish purchases

Below are our delivery rates:
$1.00–$49.99 = $9.00
$50.00–$99.99 = $4.50
$100.00 and up = Free
Self Collect = Free
